About U&I: U&I Trust, is a volunteer-run registered charity, that empowers disadvantaged children and individuals across India.
About the center: The center was established in 2023. It's already been 2 years since the kids here have been supported. English, Math and Life Skills form the main things that are taught to the kids. The kids are young, energetic and super eager to learn. Belaku THRIVES on community, with the first community from 2023 still staying in touch and hanging out. Everyone is super eager to bridge the gap that the kids have!
